meta.source: Chinese Healthy Eating Guide (based on Australian Dietary Guidelines)
meta.note: Values shown for adult males/females (likely 19-50); adjust as needed.

serve_definitions.vegetables_legumes: 1 serve = 1/2 cup cooked veg OR 1 cup salad
serve_definitions.fruit: 1 serve = 1 medium fruit OR 2 small fruits OR 1 cup canned fruit
serve_definitions.grains: 1 serve = 1 slice bread OR 1/2 cup cooked rice/pasta/noodles
serve_definitions.lean_meat_alt: 1 serve = 2 large eggs OR palm-sized lean red meat OR hand-sized chicken/fish OR 1 cup cooked beans
serve_definitions.dairy_alt: 1 serve = 1 cup milk OR 2 slices hard cheese OR 3/4 cup yoghurt OR small tub soft cheese
